channel.title: Artists on White Box
channel.description: Recent content in Artists on White Box

item.title: Pan Liang
item.description: Founder of White Box Art Group Playwright, Director, Producer CEO of the international news website “Dragon News” Founder of the God of Wealth Drama Company Curator of Guangzhou’s first local comprehensive art exhibition

item.title: Dai Zhen
item.description: CO-Founder of White Box Art Group Curator, Photographer, Editor Holds a Master’s degree from Beijing Film Academy and is currently pursuing a Ph.D. at the University of Macau Serves as the Director of the Guangdong Branch of the Chinese Contemporary Sculpture Art Research Institute and the Institute of Audiovisual Media Studies

item.title: Zhang Jianhua
item.description: Independent Artist Member of the Chinese Democratic League President of the Guangdong Branch of the Chinese Contemporary Sculpture Art Research Institute Committee Member of the Visual Arts Committee of the Chinese Stage Art Association Visiting Professor at Renmin University of China, Beijing University of Technology, and Beijing Modern Management University

item.title: Professor Lu Li
item.description: Painter Formerly served as the Head of the Department of Fine Arts at Zhaoqing College

item.title: Associate Professor Xu Jichun
item.description: Sculptor Senior Arts and Crafts Master

item.title: Lv Yuchao
item.description: Independent Photographer Co-founder and Secretary-General of the Guangdong Large Format Photography Association Distinguished Lecturer at Jinan University and Guangzhou University

item.title: Ji Hong
item.description: Independent Artist Distinguished Consultant at Lishui International Center for Classical Craft and Image

item.title: Yuan Hai
item.description: Film Still Photographer Referred to as the “Pioneer of Contemporary Chinese Film Still Photography”
